synopsis.text: Sasaki Gonzaburou, a new transfer student, joins Tachikawa Tetsuya's high school class with a surprising twist: despite the rumors of a male student, a charming girl walks through the door. However, the class is left in shock when the newcomer introduces themselves as a boy who enjoys cross-dressing, believing it suits him better. Tachikawa, an aspiring archer seeking to follow in his late grandfather's footsteps, finds himself intrigued by the enigmatic Gonzaburou, who also expresses interest in joining the archery club. As the two students connect, they explore their shared passion for archery and navigate the complexities of identity and self-expression.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
